widiyowa - 1 widiyowa - 2 widiyowa - 3 widiyowa - 4 72 wana jathika nidahas dina ruk ropana wadasatahana, 2020-02-04 72 wana jathika nidahas dinaya nimiththen kurunagala disthrik lekam karyalaye aapada kalamanakarana parishreye palathuru pala situwime wadasatahana kurunagala disthrik lekam gamini ilangarathna mahathage pradhanathwayen disthrik lekam karyalaye saha rajya aayathanayanhi niladharinge sahabhagithwayen pawathwinu athara mallawapitiya wennoruwa waw rakshithaye mi ha kumbauk pala 50k ropanaya kirime wadasatahana kurunagala disthrik lekam gamini ilangarathna mahathage pradhanathwayen, mallawapitiya pradeshiya lekam en.ee.ee.es. priyankara mahatha, kurunagala pradeshiya lekam ee.em.em.es. eekanayaka mahatha ha disthrik lekam karyalaye saha rajya aayathanayanhi niladharinge sahabhagithwayen pawathwina. 72 wana jathika nidahas dinayata samagamiwa shramadana wadasatahana, 2020-02-04 kurunagala athugala prawesha margaya ha aashritha pradeshaya saha disthrik aapada kalamanakarana parishraye shramadana wadasatahanak disthrik lekam gamini ilangarathna mahathage maga penwima matha disthrik lekam karyaliya niladharinge sahabhagithwayen krayathmaka wiya.

deshiya snukar tharaga kshethraye wishishtathama kridakayange daskam uraga balana yu.dab.sumathipala anusmarana kusalana 62wani jathika snukar shurathawaliye awasan purwa wataye tharaga ada pa.wa.3.00ta sugathadasa krida hotalaye pihiti shri lanka biliyad ha snukar sangam mulasthaye di pawathwe.em.es.em.rashid ha susantha botheju pereda pawathi tharaga jayaganimin awasan purwa watayata sudusukam labagathha.tharagawaliye ardha awasan purwa watayedi em.em.mubin (yuda)/ti.ech.em.farshad (islamyonaka) samagath, tishan samarasinha (otars)/em.ised.ee.sulfi (roman) samagath tharaga eeye paswaruwe pawathwimata niyamithawa thibu athara awasan purwa watayata piwisena sesu kridakayan dedena ehi di thiranaya kirimata niyamithawa thibini.pereda pawathi ardha awasan wataye tharagayakin yuda hamudawe mohomad rimsan wata 5-3kin parajaya kirimata muwars krida samajaye em.es.em.rashid samathwiya.
